projects.title: Stop Time Blindness
projects.description: A lightweight task manager for daily productivity.
projects.problem: I needed a simple way to track daily tasks
projects.approach: Used localStorage to persist tasks and JS for logic
projects.result: A fast offline task tracker that works in PIP for tasks

projects.title: Reading Crystal Ball
projects.problem: A computer vision project which help children read through a translating text to old english and speaking thorough a text to speech engine

projects.title: Space Generation
projects.problem: Help educate and be more educated about space events
projects.approach: Fetched data from the NASA API API
projects.result: Live learning of any past space event

projects.title: Handwriting Converter
projects.description: Converts handwritten text into digital text.
projects.problem: Needed a way to digitize handwritten notes
